definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Immanuēl (with us is God);—´[[י]] Is 7:14 van d. H. Baer; [[עִמָּנוּ אֵל]] Gi;—name of child, symbolizing presence of ´[[י]] to deliver his people (on interpret. v. Comm.)—[[עִמָּנוּ אֵל]] Is 8:8, Is 8:10 is declaration of trust and confidence, with us is God ! (cf. Ps 46:8, Ps 46:11); v. [[עִם]].
